name: Battle Machines
description:
I'm cristian, a young game developer (programmer and 3D modeler), I'm working on this project for 2 months alone, I hope you like it.

For now this project will be paused, my budget was for a 2 month job.

But when I can, I'm going to improve the product.
My next goal is music and sounds, in addition to the new special powers, other car models and racing mode.

Do not hesitate to write to CTrinidadGames@gmail.com
